description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the NTLM spoofing vulnerability (CVE-2024-30081):

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB updates based on your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5040442.
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2, apply KB5040442.
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2, apply KB5040431.
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5040427.
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2, apply KB5040448.

2. After downloading, follow the installation instructions provided in the update package.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the security vulnerability related to NTLM spoofing, which can lead to the exposure of sensitive information.
- Ensure the system is running a compatible version of Windows before proceeding.

**Preconditions**:
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation to prevent data loss.

**Update Package Links**:
- For KB5040442: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442
- For KB5040431: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431
- For KB5040427: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427
- For KB5040448: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448
